sect1.title: 介绍
sect1.para: &app; 是一款为你制作的个人财务软件，它功能丰富， 从最简单的功能到非常复杂的任务，这款软件都足够让你用来跟踪记录你的所有财务信息。 这款软件也是少有的能够支持国际货币的财务软件，也是唯一一款开源财务类软件。 最棒的是，&app; 易于学习和使用！
那么，&app; 能够为你做什么呢？ 它可以尽可能细致地跟踪你的个人财务情况。 如果你是刚开始使用&app; 跟踪记录你的账本，你也许会想同时记录好现金和信用卡， 从而更好地检查发现你的钱到底花在了哪些方面。当你开始投资的时候，你可以使用 &app; 监控你的投资组合。买车还是买房？&app;将会帮助你计划你的投资和跟踪贷款的支付。 如果你的财务记录跨越全球，&app;为你提供了国际货币支持。

caption.para: 图片展现了一张采用多种货币和投资的账户图表。

sect1.para: &app;不仅很适用于个人财务，也足够用于企业应用。这款软件 有很多适用于企业的功能特点，比如完整的应收账款和应付账款系统，税务报表构建。 你将会发现以上和更多其他适用于企业的功能特点是令人惊讶地强大且易用。

sect2.title: 易用
sect2.para: 仅仅需要几分钟的学习，你就将能够输入你的个人财务信息并且生成代表你财务状况的丰富多彩的图表。 If you can use the register in the back of your checkbook - you can use &app;! Type directly into the register, tab between fields, and use quick-fill to automatically complete transactions. The interface is customizable from within the application itself.

listitem.para: 易用的菜单: &app;的菜单设计与 GNOME Human Interface Guidelines的规范相一致。 这意味着软件的菜单选项都是非常简单的，和许多其他的GNOME应用都是相似的。
文档: &app; 有内建的帮助文档和丰富的用户指导文档。
导入方法: &app; 除了支持手动输入之外，还支持多种 输入交易的方法。如果你能够通过网络查看自己的银行账户，那么这种支持会非常有用， 因为许多银行和信用卡公司都支持下列几种导入方法之一。这样你就只需要在输入数据上 花更少的时间，而能够用更多的时间去分析结果。
快速从文件导入(QIF): Import Quicken QIF style files, a popular file format with many commercial personal finance software packages.
Open Financial Exchange (OFX): &app; has been the first free software application to support the Open Financial Exchange protocol. Many financial institutions are moving towards this format.

Home Banking Computer Interface (HBCI): &app; has been the first free software application to support the German Home Banking Computer Interface protocol. This protocol includes statement download, initiates bank transfers, and makes direct debits possible.
报表: &app; 预置了超过30种报表，包括 帐户摘要，收入，费用，交易报告，资产负债表，损益，投资组合评估等。 报表支持图形化的数据展示，包括饼图，条形图和散点图。这些报表可以被 导出为HTML 文件，也很容易进行定制。

Scheduled Transactions: &app; now has the ability to automatically create and enter transactions, or remind you when these transactions are due, giving you the choice of entering, postponing or removing the automated transaction.
抵押和贷款还款助手: Used to set up a variable payment loan scheduled transaction.
轻松对账: Integrated reconciliation makes reconciling your &app; accounts with statements simple and effective.
多平台兼容: &app; 支持多种平台和操作系统。完整支持的操作系统（及平台）见下表：
GNU/Linux (x86, x86_64), FreeBSD (x86, x86_64), OpenBSD (x86, x86_64), Apple MacOS (64-bit Intel), and Microsoft Windows (Windows 7 and later).
Apple MacOS (32-bit Intel, PPC) and Microsoft Windows (XP and Vista).
Microsoft Windows (2000).
have been known to work with SGI IRIX (MIPS), IBM AIX 4.1.5 (RS/6000), Unixware 7 (Intel), SCO OpenServer 5.0.4 (Intel), and Solaris (Sparc) but their current status is unknown.

sect2.title: 跟踪你的投资
sect2.para: &app; 包含很多投资方面的功能特点，能够让你跟踪你的所有投资。 通过&app; 你可以单独跟踪股票（每个账户一支股票）或者账户的投资组合（一组可以被共同展示的账户）
&app; 支持股票和基金的在线报价查询。这意味着你不再需要一次查询一支股票或者基金的价格。 这个过程是自动化的，你可以查到你所有股票的价格。

sect2.title: 国际化支持
sect2.para: &app; is truly an application that works with and understands users from all around the world. There are many built-in features to facilitate interaction with the international world we live in today.

listitem.para:
本地化支持: &app; 已经被翻译为56种语言。 The best ones, with over 90% translated, are Croatian, German, Hebrew, Portuguese, Spanish, and Ukrainian. Almost as good, with over 80% translated, are Catalan, Dutch, Japanese, Latvian, Russian, Serbian, and Turkish.
If you want to create or improve the translation of your language see .
International Format Handling: &app; understands that different countries display the date and numbers differently. You are able to work with the date and number formats you are accustomed to.
多种货币和货币交易支持: All in ISO 4217 defined currencies are supported and can be bought and sold (traded). Currency movements between accounts remain fully balanced if "Trading Accounts" is enabled.

在线汇率: With &app;, you no longer need look up your exchange rates one at a time. The process can be automated, to always present you with the account values converted to your preferred currency using the latest exchange rates.

sect2.title: 企业支持
sect2.para: &app; 有许多功能特点可以满足企业账务需要。

listitem.para: 账户收支: &app; has an integrated Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable system. You can track Customers, Vendors, Invoicing and Bill Payment, and use different Tax and Billing Terms in a small business.
折旧: &app; can track depreciation of capital assets.
报表: &app; offers a wide variety of ready-to-use business reports.

sect2.title: 记账功能
sect2.para: 对于那些在记账方面有很多知识经验的人，下面是一个&app;记账功能的清单。

listitem.para: 复式记账: 每笔交易必须有借有贷，且借贷相等。 这样就保证了账目平衡 -即收入和支出之差， 与所有银行、现金、股票和其他资产之和相等。
交易分录: 一笔交易可以被分录为若干块，分别 记录税、费和其他项目。
会计科目表: 一个主账户下可以有详细的 账户层次结构。这就允许一些相同的账户类型，比如 现金、银行或股票等可以被放进同一个主账户下，例如 资产账户。

General Journal: One register window can display multiple accounts at the same time. This eases the trouble of tracking down typing/entry errors. It also provides a convenient way of viewing a portfolio of many stocks, by showing all transactions in that portfolio.
收支账户类型（目录）: 这些类型可以对你的现金流进行归类处理，并且，合理地使用复式记账， 将会给你提供一个精准的盈亏报告。

sect1.title: 关于本书
sect1.para: 这本手册的目的是节约你的时间，手册将能够使你尽快地开始使用 &app; 。
每个章节都遵循简单的格式。每个章节都由对 概念的讨论开始，这部分将会介绍本章中涉及和使用的一般主题和术语。 How-To部分，介绍特定的操作步骤。最后是 Putting It All Together 部分，将会给出一个详细的范例。
小白用户将会发现概念部分非常有帮助。这部分 为跟踪你的财务状况的良好方法提供了参考，并作为财务背景和术语的一般介绍。 有经验的用户可以直接跳转到How-To部分 快速浏览操作步骤，这部分给你提供了完成特定任务的细致步骤。 Putting It All Together部分以教程的形式展现了真实世界中的范例。 从中创建的一个文件开始， 后面每个连续的章节都是建立在上个章节的教程之上。

这本手册包括三个部分：
入门
管理个人财务
管理企业财务

sect1.title: 获取更多帮助
sect1.para: &app; offers help in many ways, including the Tip of the Day, context help, a website, a wiki, the mailing lists, and IRC chat.

sect2.title: Context Help
sect2.para: The context help provides detailed instructions for using &app;'s menus, windows, and controls. To open online help, select Help Contents.

The &appname; Help window also acts as a simple web browser, so you can pull up a website for additional information. You can open any website under this window by clicking the Open Toolbar button and then typing in the URL. Use the Back, Forward, Reload, Stop, and Print buttons as you would in a standard browser.

sect2.title: &app; 网站
sect2.para: The &appname; website contains helpful information about the program and about any updates to it. It also contains links to other online resources.

sect2.title: &app; Wiki
sect2.para: An immense amount of less-formal documenation, both of &app; itself and its maintenance and development may be found in the &app; Wiki; the Frequently Asked Questions page should be a first stop whenever you encounter difficulty using &app;.

sect2.title: &app; On-line Assistance
sect2.para: The primary source of user support is the user mailing list. If you prefer a web forum-like presentation, you can use it via Nabble. One must subscribe before posting, even if using Nabble.

Several of the developers monitor the #gnucash channel at irc.gnome.org. They're usually doing something else, too, and of course aren't always at their computers. Log in, ask your question, and stay logged in; it may be several hours before your question is noticed and responded to. To see if you missed anything check the IRC logs.
The &app; website has more details on these channels. You will also find pointers there to additional useful resources such as the &app; wiki and bug tracking system.

sect2.title: Topic Search
sect2.para: The online manual also provides a search function. To search for a particular topic, click the Search tab at the bottom of the help window and type in your topic in the field provided. Click the Search button to complete your search. A list of choices should appear in the box below, clicking a choice will bring up its text on the right.
